anyway of maing it one screen?

hi booger,

3d movies will show two screens untill you activate 3d on your remote.. we have the samsung  3d tv and it will ask you to select how you want the movie to display the moment you select 3d to start on tv.. there is a option to make two screens one screen..our tv show an icon with two people next to each other.. if you select that then it becomes one 3d screen thats perfect 3d!! better to put movie on usb or external drive to play

@aussielove i do put it on a external hardive and plug it into my 3 tv, i do have the 3D button on my remote but i havent seen the optaion to change it to one screen is there another button i have to press?
@aussielove dont worry i got it working thanks for your help :)
